problem_statement:
Dragonfly crashes on processing transaction
I did my best, but I can't reproduce this bug with the minimal scenario.
This is a race condition bug. Some garbage can be left after one of the previous commands.
This crash can be reproduced with `traffic-replay` using `-ignore-parse-errors` option. 

[traffic.tar.gz](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/20542148/traffic.tar.gz)

The crash log:
